positions.subtitle: Soonicorn Ventures
positions.description: Soonicorn Ventures (SV) is a Startup Investment Tech Platform. Its an invite only community of Early stage VC Funds, Private Equity Funds, Family Offices, Angel Funds, Angel Networks, Accelerators, HNIs and Startups.SV provides investors access to pre-screened Startup deals with an option to co-invest with other investors. Startups can create their online profile to network with investors to raise funds.With the hybrid (Online and Offline) approach ofengagement, SV focuses on retaining the personal touch while assisting in closing deals digitally. SV team also helps in deal related affairs like Due Diligence, Valuation, Legal Documents and Portfolio Management.SV team is formed of Investment Bankers and Analysts holding an extensive experience in managing buy side and sell side deals globally.
positions.title: Senior Associate
positions.description_html:
Soonicorn Ventures (SV) is a Startup Investment Tech Platform. Its an invite only community of Early stage VC Funds, Private Equity Funds, Family Offices, Angel Funds, Angel Networks, Accelerators, HNIs and Startups.

SV provides investors access to pre-screened Startup deals with an option to co-invest with other investors. Startups can create their online profile to network with investors to raise funds.

With the hybrid (Online and Offline) approach of
engagement, SV focuses on retaining the personal touch while assisting in closing deals digitally. SV team also helps in deal related affairs like Due Diligence, Valuation, Legal Documents and Portfolio Management.

SV team is formed of Investment Bankers and Analysts holding an extensive experience in managing buy side and sell side deals globally.

SV provides investors access to pre-screened Startup deals with an option to co-invest with other investors. Startups can create their online profile to network with investors to raise funds.

experience.title: Senior Associate
experience.description: Nucleus Advisors is an Investment Banking and Risk Advisory Firm devised to help growing businesses. Nucleus works closely with SMEs, Startups, Unlisted and Listed entities. Team is highly determined, focused, swift and responsible. Team has a diversified experience across industry and speaks a language of business owners. Most importantly, team is young at heart!
